Description The 2014 Christmas charity mount, available in the Crowns Shop for the 12 Days of the Spiral.
View of the Mount in use

Description This Charity Candied Ram Mount was introduced in December 2020. Courtesy of Wizard101 We’re kicking off the 12 Days of the Spiral by giving back and bringing you a new charity mount in Wizard101 and Pirate101! This mount will be available through Tuesday, January 5th. Nothing is more irresistible than a sweet new friend! Straight from Karamelle, say hello to the Charity Candied Ram Mount, now available in the Crown Shop in both Wizard101 and Pirate101! Don’t let its mischievous grin and bright horns fool you, this fluffy pal has a sugary soft side. Befriend it before it leaves the shop on 1/5! Net proceeds up to fifty thousand dollars from the sale of this mount will be split equally between Creative Action and The Ronald McDonald House of Dallas.
View of the Mount in use

Description The Charity Chrismoose is a mount that could be bought from the Crown Shop in December 2011 during The 12 Days of Wizard event. Purchases benefited the Austin Children's Shelter and Children's Medical Center at Legacy.
View of the Mount in use
Description The Charity Fa-La-La-La Llama is a limited time Mount to help raise money for 2 kid benefiting organizations; the Austin Children's Shelter and Children's Medical Center at Legacy.
View of the Mount in use

Description This Charity Feliz Navidog Mount was introduced during the 12 Days of the Spiral Event in December 2022 and a permanent version was available online for $15 for a limited time. From Wizard101 website: We’re kicking off the 12 Days of the Spiral by giving back and bringing you a new charity mount in Wizard101 and Pirate101! This mount will be available through Monday, January 2nd. Feliz Navidog! That's how it goes, right? Jolly and scruffy, say hello to the Charity Feliz Navidog Mount, now available in Wizard101 and Pirate101's Online Cart! A perfect steed to deliver presents and good times to your friends and family. Befriend it before it leaves the shop on 1/2! Even better news - if you buy the Charity Feliz Navidog Mount, you will receive the mount in BOTH Wizard101 and Pirate101! Net proceeds up to fifty thousand dollars from the sale of this mount will be split equally between Creative Action and AbleGamers.
View of the Mount in use

Description This Charity Hippogriff Mount was introduced in December 2021. Courtesy of Wizard101 We’re kicking off the 12 Days of the Spiral by giving back and bringing you a new charity mount in Wizard101 and Pirate101! This mount will be available through Monday, January 3rd. We really hippopota-missed the holidays! Here and ready to party, say hello to the Charity Hippogriff Mount, now available in the Crown Shop in both Wizard101 and Pirate101! Decked in festive wear from head to mistletoe, this cheery creature is sure to jingle all the way into your heart. Befriend it before it leaves the shop on 1/3! Net proceeds up to fifty thousand dollars from the sale of this mount will be split equally between Creative Action and AbleGamers
View of the Mount in use
Description The Charity Meowmodon was a mount that could be purchased from the Crown Shop in December 2009. All proceeds from sales went to charity.
View of the Mount in use

Description The Charity Noelephant was a limited time mount that could be bought during the 12 Days of the Spiral Event in 2013. The Noelephant helped raise money for 3 organizations; the Austin Children's Shelter, Make-A-Wish® Central & South Texas and Children's Medical Center at Legacy.
View of the Mount in use

Description This Charity Parade Truck Mount was introduced in November 2022. It was offered on the Wizard101 website for a $10 donation. From the Wizard101 website: KingsIsle Supporting Veterans KingsIsle is teaming up with Semper Fi & America's Fund to support veterans! The Charity Parade Truck Mount will be in the Wizard101 online cart now through the end of November. Not only will the bundle give you a sweet new ride to explore the Spiral, but all proceeds from the sale of this charity mount will be sent to Semper Fi & America's Fund! This Mount is "No Sell"
View of the Mount in use

Description The Charity Pride Raptor was a Permanent Mount that was introduced in June 2025 for a limited time in the online cart on Wizard101.com for $10. One hundred percent of this Mount's proceeds went toward Outright International, a nonprofit organization that works with local partners to advance the rights and well-being of LGBTIQ people around the world. From the Kingsisle Blog: March into Pride Month with your new dino bestie! The Charity Pride Raptor Mount has arrived in Wizard101, bright, bubbly, and bursting with rainbow charm! This adorable mount is the perfect way to show your pride and spread joy across the Spiral. The Wizard101 Charity Pride Raptor Mount can be purchased in the Wizard101 online cart here until the end of June. All proceeds from the sale of the Charity Pride Raptor Mount will go to Outright International."
View of the Mount in use

Description The Charity Rex was a Permanent Mount that was introduced in May 2024 for a limited time in the online cart on Wizard101.com for $10. One hundred percent of this Mount's prehistoric proceeds went toward Stack Up, a U.S. charity supporting veterans and active duty military servicemembers. This Charity Mount is returned occasionally to the online cart for special sales or events. From the Wizard101 website: "KingsIsle is teaming up with Stack Up to support veterans! The Charity Rex Mount will be in the Wizard101 online cart now through the end of May. Not only will the bundle give you a roarin' new ride to explore the Spiral, but all proceeds from the sale of this charity mount will be sent to Stack Up!"
View of the Mount in use
